verses.verse: For we know <S%G1492><s%> that if <S%G1437><s%> our earthly <S%G1919><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> of this <S%G3588><s%> tabernacle <S%G4636><s%> were dissolved, <S%G2647><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> a building <S%G3619><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> an house <S%G3614><s%> not made <S%G886><s%> with hands, <S%G886><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> in the heavens. <S%G3772><s%>

For in this <S%G5129><s%> we groan, <S%G4727><s%> earnestly <S%G1971><s%> desiring <S%G1971><s%> to be clothed <S%G1902><s%> on with our house <S%G3613><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is from heaven: <S%G3772><s%>
If <S%G1489><s%> so be that being clothed <S%G1746><s%> we shall not be found <S%G2147><s%> naked. <S%G1131><s%>

For we that are in this <S%G3588><s%> tabernacle <S%G4636><s%> do groan, <S%G4727><s%> being burdened: <S%G916><s%> not for that we would <S%G2309><s%> be unclothed, <S%G1562><s%> but clothed <S%G1902><s%> on, that mortality <S%G2349><s%> might be swallowed <S%G2666><s%> up of life. <S%G2222><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> he that has worked <S%G2716><s%> us for the selfsame <S%G846><s%> <S%G5124><s%> thing is God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> has given <S%G1325><s%> to us the earnest <S%G728><s%> of the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> we are always <S%G3842><s%> confident, <S%G2292><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that, whilst we are at <S%G1722><s%> home <S%G1736><s%> in the body, <S%G4983><s%> we are absent <S%G1553><s%> from the Lord: <S%G2962><s%>
(For we walk <S%G4043><s%> by faith, <S%G4102><s%> not by sight: <S%G1491><s%>)

We are confident, <S%G2292><s%> I say, and willing <S%G2106><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> to be absent <S%G1553><s%> from the body, <S%G4983><s%> and to be present <S%G1736><s%> with the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Why <S%G1352><s%> we labor, <S%G5389><s%> that, whether <S%G1535><s%> present <S%G1736><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> absent, <S%G1553><s%> we may be accepted <S%G2101><s%> of him.

For we must <S%G1163><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> appear <S%G5319><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> the judgment <S%G968><s%> seat <S%G968><s%> of Christ; <S%G5547><s%> that every <S%G1538><s%> one may receive <S%G2865><s%> the things done in his body, <S%G4983><s%> according <S%G4314><s%> to that he has done, <S%G4238><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> it be good <S%G18><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> bad. <S%G2556><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the terror <S%G5401><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> we persuade <S%G3982><s%> men; <S%G444><s%> but we are made <S%G5319><s%> manifest <S%G5319><s%> to God; <S%G2316><s%> and I trust <S%G1679><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> are made <S%G5319><s%> manifest <S%G5319><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> consciences. <S%G4893><s%>

For we commend <S%G4921><s%> not ourselves <S%G1438><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to you, but give <S%G1325><s%> you occasion <S%G874><s%> to glory <S%G2745><s%> on <S%G5228><s%> our behalf, <S%G5228><s%> that you may have <S%G2192><s%> somewhat to answer them which glory <S%G2744><s%> in appearance, <S%G4383><s%> and not in heart. <S%G2588><s%>
For whether <S%G1535><s%> we be beside <S%G1839><s%> ourselves, it is to God: <S%G2316><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> we be sober, <S%G4993><s%> it is for your <S%G5213><s%> cause.

For the love <S%G26><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> constrains <S%G4912><s%> us; because we thus <S%G5124><s%> judge, <S%G2919><s%> that if <S%G1487><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> died <S%G599><s%> for all, <S%G3956><s%> then <S%G686><s%> were all <S%G3956><s%> dead: <S%G599><s%>

And that he died <S%G599><s%> for all, <S%G3956><s%> that they which live <S%G2198><s%> should not from now on <S%G3371><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> to themselves, <S%G1438><s%> but to him which died <S%G599><s%> for them, and rose <S%G1453><s%> again. <S%G1453><s%>

Why <S%G5620><s%> from now on <S%G575><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> we no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh: <S%G4561><s%> yes, <S%G1161><s%> though <S%G1499><s%> we have known <S%G1097><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> from now on <S%G2089><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> we him no <S%G3765><s%> more. <S%G2089><s%>

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> man be in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> he is a new <S%G2537><s%> creature: <S%G2937><s%> old <S%G744><s%> things are passed <S%G3928><s%> away; behold, <S%G2400><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things are become <S%G1096><s%> new. <S%G2537><s%>

And all <S%G3956><s%> things are of God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> has reconciled <S%G2644><s%> us to himself <S%G1438><s%> by Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and has given <S%G1325><s%> to us the ministry <S%G1248><s%> of reconciliation; <S%G2643><s%>

To wit, <S%G5613><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> was in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> reconciling <S%G2644><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> to himself, <S%G1438><s%> not imputing <S%G3049><s%> their trespasses <S%G3900><s%> to them; and has committed <S%G5087><s%> to us the word <S%G3056><s%> of reconciliation. <S%G2643><s%>

Now <S%G3767><s%> then we are ambassadors <S%G4243><s%> for Christ, <S%G5547><s%> as though God <S%G2316><s%> did beseech <S%G3870><s%> you by us: we pray <S%G1189><s%> you in Christ's <S%G5547><s%> stead, <S%G5228><s%> be you reconciled <S%G2644><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

For he has made <S%G4160><s%> him to be sin <S%G266><s%> for us, who knew <S%G1097><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> sin; <S%G266><s%> that we might be made <S%G1096><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in him.
